data.eml:eml: Holothuria (Semperothuria) roseomaculata n. sp. (Aspidochirotida: Holothuriidae), a coral-reef inhabiting sea cucumber from the western Pacific Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kerr, Alexander M. (2013): Holothuria (Semperothuria) roseomaculata n. sp. (Aspidochirotida: Holothuriidae), a coral-reef inhabiting sea cucumber from the western Pacific Ocean. Zootaxa 3641 (4): 384-394, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3641.4.5
